name: Synchron Quantum
text:
You can use the following effects once per turn. You can only Special Summon LIGHT/DARK/EARTH Cyberse monsters during the Duel you use this Skill (excluding Special Summons from your hand/Extra Deck).
● Reveal 1 "Cyberse Synchron" in your hand, add 1 Level 3 or Level 4 LIGHT Cyberse monster with 800 DEF or less to your hand, and send 1 card in your hand to the Graveyard.
● Set 1 "Cyberse Synchron" onto your field from your hand. Then, you can return up to 2 Cyberse monsters to your Deck that are banished or are in your Graveyard.
